name: Suusatoshigi.GitHub.io
tagline: It is said that writing 1000 Words a Day can Change My Life
body:
## Hello, welcome to SuuSatoshigi's blog, I am SuuSatoshigi.

##I’m a programmer, dancer currently living in Guangzhou, China.
编程主攻:iOS
街舞主攻:waccking
爱旅游，喜欢用数位板偶尔画出脑海的一瞬灵感，所以最喜欢旅游的时候一边走一边脑补各种场合，纪录下来，等旅游完之后画画。
语言的话，英语和日语也就一般般，从小讲到大的粤语和国语不知道算不算精通呢？




##If you want to get in touch with me, [email](suusatoshigi@gmail.com) is best.

####I'm also on [GitHub](https://github.com/SuuSatoshigi), [git@oschina](http://git.oschina.net/suusatoshigi), and [CSDN](http://blog.csdn.net/u010558548/article/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
